backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling Valentine snapshots, user profiles, and access control with versioning and write‑token authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend changes, required defaults, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for major frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining color variables, theming, and base layout rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/demos/three-remote-video: Standalone demo page showing three remotely loaded videos with responsive layout, lazy loading, and error handling.
frontend/REMOTE_VIDEO_SAVE_SPEC.md: Technical spec detailing the remote video save architecture, data flow, error handling, and backend/ frontend integration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing page navigation, user state, save/restore logic, and remote snapshot handling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders animated floating heart decorations positioned across the screen.
frontend/src/components/SaveProgressButt: Save button with popover showing save options, login handling, shareable link copying, and status display.
frontend/src/components/StepNavigation.t: Provides step-based navigation between landing, videos, and final pages with forward/back controls.
Layout wrapper applying background styling and optional floating hearts around page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentineSnapshotP: Polling hook that checks for remote snapshot updates and notifies when a newer version exists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme color variables, custom utilities, and animations for floating hearts.
frontend/src/lib/saveId.ts: Helpers for reading, writing, and removing a saveId query parameter and constructing shareable links.
frontend/src/lib/valentineProgressStorag: Manages saving and loading Valentine progress using localStorage for text and IndexedDB for video blobs.
frontend/src/lib/valentineRemoteProgress: Implements remote snapshot saving/loading with validation, error handling, token storage, and video metadata encoding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity, and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/FinalMessagePage.tsx: UI page for entering the final Valentine's message with a form and navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page for writing the initial Valentine's message and proceeding to the video step.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Page for editing video titles and previewing uploaded videos before moving to the final message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and persisting values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, radii, dark mode, content paths, and animation/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for a multi-page Valentine’s site with real‑time cloud persistence.
